How do I make skype visible on systray?: type this in a terminal window gsettings set com.canonical.Unity.Panel systray-whitelist "['Skype']"
how come skype is not whitelisted by default?
and why require terminal magic for whitelisting it?
beats me dude; i just provide volunteer support
type this to get existing white-listed apps -> gsettings get com.canonical.Unity.Panel systray-whitelist
you need to log out and login back for it to take effect
